Crimes.Evidence_Type: Investigative findings linking passport to fraud

Crimes.Key_Factor_in_Determination: Lack of explicit authority for standalone sanction

Crimes.Procedural_Fairness: Proper process followed but error in law
Crimes.Credibility_Issues: Not central to the legal issue
Crimes.Legal_Defense_or_Challenge: Ultra vires challenge to adjudicator's authority
Crimes.Omission_Type: Failure to align sanction with statutory framework
